title: Real-time Object Detection
description: Powered by advanced computer vision models like COCO-SSD and YOLO variants for instant recognition.

title: Instant Description Generator
description: Get contextual information about detected objects in natural language instantly.

title: AI Voice Output
description: Hear object names and descriptions through natural AI-powered text-to-speech synthesis.

title: Camera Access
description: Seamlessly switch between front and rear cameras with intuitive permission handling.

title: Gesture + AR Overlays
description: Future support for augmented reality overlays and gesture-based interactions.

title: Lightweight On-Device Models
description: Run efficiently on your device using TensorFlow.js, TFLite, or ONNX models.
